entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
